
{{Server event}}

{{New items|3.0140|1.4|
This event is triggered when a custom weapon gets fired.
}}

==Parameters==
''None''

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the element that fired the weapon. If the server is the creator it returns ''nil''.

==Cancel effect==
If this event is [[/Event_system#Canceling.md|canceled]], the bullet(s) won't be synced with other players.

==Requirements==
{{Requirements|1.4|n/a}}

==Example== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addEventHandler( "onWeaponFire", root,
    function ()
        if ( isElement( source ) ) and ( getElementType( source ) == "player" ) then
            outputChatBox( "You fired a weapon!", source, 0, 225, 0 )
        end
    end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
